name: Chef Capybara
description:
Chef Capybara is an adrenaline-fueled platformer that takes you on a thrilling culinary journey with a little capybara as the protagonist. Step into the capybara's tiny chef hat and embark on a quest to create delicious dishes. From the simplest salads to exotic delicacies and complex sauces, the culinary world is yours to explore.

Navigate through vibrant and immersive worlds, each filled with unique challenges and mouth-watering ingredients waiting to be discovered. Traverse perilous terrains, leap across treacherous gaps, and dodge cunning traps that lie in wait around every corner. Precision and agility are key as you venture deeper into the game's levels, mastering the art of platforming while staying focused on your culinary mission.

Features
  • Exhilarating Platforming Action: Chef Capybara offers intense and fast-paced platforming gameplay that keeps you on the edge of your seat. Leap, dash, and dodge your way through challenging levels filled with traps and obstacles.
  • Culinary Exploration: Immerse yourself in a rich culinary world as you search for ingredients to create a wide variety of dishes. Discover new recipes, experiment with flavors, and unlock secret culinary delights.
  • Unique Worlds to Explore: Embark on a culinary adventure across diverse and visually stunning worlds. Each world presents its own set of challenges, themes, and hidden secrets, providing a captivating and immersive experience.
  • Customization and Collectibles: Collect gems scattered throughout the game to unlock adorable outfits and accessories for your capybara chef. Showcase your personal style as you cook up a storm in the kitchen.
  • Challenging Puzzles and Time Pressure: Test your culinary skills and problem-solving abilities through puzzles and time-based challenges. Plan your moves carefully, strategize, and race against the clock to create the perfect dish before time runs out.
